idea-plugin.name: Fuzzier
idea-plugin.description: A fuzzy file finder modeled after telescope for nvim. Designed to be completely usable through the keyboard.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.19.1

- Correct supported version to include 241*

0.19.0

VCS only search

Add a new action that only searches files that are being tracked by the VCS, called FuzzierVCS.
Ignored files are not included in the search, and it is not affected by the exclusion list.

Huge thanks to ramonvermeulen for fully implementing this feature.

Adding an ideavim binding

map <Leader>gf <action>(com.mituuz.fuzzier.FuzzierVCS)

Versioning changes

- The versioning scheme has been changed to follow the semantic versioning scheme more closely.
- Create changelog.md to simplify the changelog process.
